Name: Aditxt Inc.
Description: Aditxt Inc. is a pioneering biotechnology firm dedicated to transforming healthcare through its innovative platform for immune modulation and personalized medicine. Leveraging proprietary technologies, the company aims to enhance immune responses, addressing chronic diseases and allergies while improving patient outcomes. With a robust pipeline of therapeutic candidates supported by rigorous research and strategic collaborations, Aditxt is well-positioned to become a leader in the rapidly evolving field of immune-based therapies. By prioritizing scientific advancement and patient-centric solutions, Aditxt aspires to redefine the future of immunology and revolutionize healthcare.
Address: 2569 WYANDOTTE STREET, MOUNTAIN VIEW, CA, UNITED STATES, 94043
